line_1: Had struggl'd with the Marriage Noose;
Thus, to perplex the ravell'd noose,
line_2: While each a different way pursues,

line_1: And in streight Bonds their Friends and Kindred noose:
line_2: My busy Factors prudently I chuse,

line_1: And in the dance, as in the marriage noose,
line_2: Rather for merit, than for beauty, choose:

line_1: Some tatt'ling nurse to cut the noose,
